snippet: Former Patriots and Jets running back Curtis Martin and five others were elected into the Pro Football Hall of Fame on Saturday evening.
abstract: Former Patriots and Jets running back Curtis Martin and five others were elected into the Pro Football Hall of Fame on Saturday evening.
lead_paragraph: Former Patriots and Jets running back Curtis Martin was elected into the Pro Football Hall of Fame on Saturday evening. Joining him in the class of 2012 are defensive tackle Cortez Kennedy, defensive end Chris Doleman, left tackle Willie Roaf, center Dermontti Dawson and cornerback Jack Butler. Check nytimes.com for the complete story.

headline.main: Curtis Martin and Five Others to Enter Hall of Fame
